agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Pensions, Investments & Financial Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jim Murphy The committee will meet to consider the following: HB 440 Murphy Relating to general obligation bonds issued by political subdivisions. HB 477 Murphy Relating to the notice required before the issuance of certain debt obligations by political subdivisions. HB 596 Hernandez Relating to the composition of the board of trustees of the Employees Retirement System of Texas. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
